events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application was reviewed and categorised under our Engineering department based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter specializing in software development positions has been assigned to guide you through the next steps.
We completed your initial screening interview and are impressed with your background in software engineering.
Thank you for your prompt response to our interview invitation; we look forward to continuing the process with you.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th. Please prepare for coding challenges and system design questions.
You successfully completed the technical interview with strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
Your HR interview has been arranged for May 15th to discuss company culture, benefits, and next steps.
